Job Title: Junior Data Analyst

Company: NexaCore Solutions
Location: Bengaluru, India (Hybrid)
Employment Type: Full-Time
Salary: â‚¹4â€“6 LPA

About the Company

NexaCore Solutions is a growing tech firm specializing in data-driven software products for retail and logistics. We help businesses make smarter decisions using analytics, automation, and AI tools.

Job Description

We are looking for a Junior Data Analyst who will assist in gathering, cleaning, analyzing, and visualizing data to support business decisions. You will work closely with senior analysts and product teams to deliver insights that improve our operations and customer experience.

Key Responsibilities

Collect, clean, and validate datasets from multiple internal sources

Create dashboards and visualizations using Power BI or Tableau

Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) and prepare summary reports

Work with SQL to query relational databases

Assist in building automated reporting pipelines

Collaborate with product and engineering teams to understand data needs

Required Skills

Strong knowledge of Excel (Pivot Tables, VLOOKUP, Charts)

Basic understanding of Python or R

Familiarity with SQL

Good communication and documentation skills

Ability to interpret data patterns and provide insights

Preferred Skills (Good to Have)

Experience with visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)

Knowledge of statistical concepts (correlation, hypothesis testing)

Exposure to machine learning libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn

Education

Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or any related field.

Benefits

Health insurance

Work-from-home flexibility

Learning and certification reimbursements

Opportunity to work with senior data scientists

How to Apply

Send your updated resume and portfolio (if any) to:
ðŸ“§ careers@nexacore-solutions.com

Subject: Application for Junior Data Analyst â€“ [Your Name]

About the job
We are seeking AI Image Quality Experts to rigorously evaluate images generated by state-of-the-art AI models. Your insights will directly help improve how AI understands prompts, aesthetics, realism, and cultural accuracy in visual outputs.



Compensation: Industry-best, aligned with skills and experience.

Workplace Type: Hybrid

Job Location: Hyderabad/ Chennai

Job Type: Full-time / Part-time



Your Role

1.     Evaluate AI-generated images for accuracy, realism, and alignment with prompts

2.     Identify visual errors and inconsistencies, such as:

Anatomical distortions
Incorrect lighting, shadows, or perspective
Artifacting, pixelation, or rendering errors
Misrepresentation of cultural, symbolic, or stylistic details
3.     Document evaluations in a clear, structured format for research and engineering teams

4.     Suggest improvements to image datasets, prompt design, and evaluation frameworks

5.     Collaborate with a global team shaping next-generation visual AI models



Who Should Apply?

Bachelorâ€™s degree (any discipline, preferably with exposure to design, arts, media, or computer science)
Eye for detail and ability to distinguish subtle differences in image quality
Experience evaluating or working with AI image generation tools is preferred but not mandatory
Comfortable working independently with AI tools and evaluation frameworks
Excellent written communication skills in English

Weâ€™re excited to share that Innodata Inc. is expanding its AI and Machine Learning talent network, and weâ€™re looking for passionate, detail-oriented individuals to join us as Data Annotators and Content Moderators (Review & Labeling).
If you enjoy working with data, pay close attention to detail, and want to contribute to real-world AI innovation, this is an excellent opportunity to be part of a forward-thinking global team.


Role Details:

Work Mode: Remote
Engagement Type: Contract (3â€“4 Months)
Daily Commitment: 5â€“6 hours
Pay Rate: â‚¹350 per hour


What Youâ€™ll Be Doing

Reviewing and labeling online content, including sensitive material.
Ensuring data accuracy, consistency, and overall quality.
Helping build AI training datasets that power next-generation systems.
Sharing feedback and insights to improve ongoing processes.


What Weâ€™re Looking For

Bachelorâ€™s degree (or higher) with strong English proficiency.
Excellent written communication and analytical skills.
Comfortable working with various content types.
A private and secure workspace with stable internet access.


Next Step: Evaluation Process

To move forward in the selection process, please complete the following assessments:


1. Assessment Test

Evaluates your linguistic and analytical skills.






2. Versant English Proficiency Test

Assesses your spoken and written English proficiency.
A B2 or above level is required to qualify.


âœ… Once both assessments are successfully completed, you will become eligible for onboarding and background verification.


If youâ€™re detail-oriented, tech-curious, and eager to make an impact in the world of AI, weâ€™d love to have you join our growing network

Amazon is looking for an AI Content Expert II to help with annotations, content generation, and data analysis. As part of the Data Team, you will be responsible for delivering high-quality training data to improve and expand AGI's Large Language Models' (LLMs) capabilities. This is a fixed term contractual role for 12 months, requiring flexibility to work in rotational shifts.

Key job responsibilities

As an AI Content Expert, you will be responsible for creating training data that are complex in nature and will require you to make informed and high judgement decisions in each case. You will be working closely with scientists and engineers to review and update guidelines, identify tooling improvement opportunities, and engage in conversations regarding the quality of data.

 Creating and annotating high-quality complex training data in multiple modalities (text, image, video) on various topics, including technical or science-related content
 Writing grammatically correct texts in different styles with various degrees of creativity, strictly adhering to provided guidelines
 Performing audits and quality checks of tasks completed by other specialists, if required
 Making sound judgments and logical decisions when faced with ambiguous or incomplete information while performing tasks
 Diving deep into issues and implementing solutions independently
 Identifying and reporting tooling bugs and suggesting improvements

A day in the life

We are looking for a ML Data Associate (MLDA) to undertake the task of foundational labeling functions, such as dialogue evaluation on speech, text, audio, video data.

Your ability to concentrate, multi-task and your high attention to detail helps you deliver high-quality work as well as maintaining strict confidentiality and follow all applicable Amazon policies for securing confidential information. You will be a part of a diverse team with the shared vision of improving customersâ€™ lives with practical, useful generative AI innovations. An inner drive, individuality, and a creative mind are extremely beneficial.

Basic Qualifications

 Bachelorâ€™s degree in a relevant field or equivalent professional experience
 2+ year of experience working with written language data, including experience with annotation, and other forms of data markup.
 Strong research skills to gather relevant information, understand complex topics, and synthesize multiple resources; understanding of basic academic integrity, i.e. plagiarism.
 Excellent attention to details and ability to focus for a long period of time
 Ability to effectively write and evaluate diverse subject matter across various domains*
 Ability to adapt writing style to suit various style guidelines and customers.
 Ability to adapt well to fast

Preferred Qualifications

 Strong proficiency in English. Candidate must demonstrate excellent writing, reading, and comprehension skills (C1 level in the Common European Framework CEFR scale).
 Experience with creating complex data for LLM training and evaluation
 Strong understanding of U.S.
 Comfortable with high
 Familiarity with common markup languages such as HTML, XML, Markdown
 Familiarity with common standard text formats such as JSON, CSV, RTF
 Working knowledge of Python or another scripting language
 Familiarity with regular expressions syntax
 Familiarity with Large Language Models
 Comfort in annotation work that may include sensitive content

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region youâ€™re applying in isnâ€™t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.

About the job
About Us:

Soul AI is a pioneering company founded by IIT Bombay and IIM Ahmedabad alumni, with a strong founding team from IITs, NITs, and BITS. We specialize in delivering high-quality human-curated data, AI-first scaled operations services, and more. Based in SF and Hyderabad, we are a young, fast-moving team on a mission to build AI for Good, driving innovation and positive societal impact.


We are seeking an experienced IT Support Specialist to provide technical support and ensure the smooth functioning of our IT infrastructure. You will troubleshoot hardware/software issues and assist our teams with technical queries.


Key Responsibilities:

Provide technical support to internal teams and resolve IT issues promptly.
Install, configure, and maintain hardware and software systems.
Monitor and maintain system performance and security.


Required Qualifications:

2+ years of experience in IT support or a similar role.
Strong knowledge of operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux) and networking.
Familiarity with troubleshooting hardware and software issues.


Why Join Us?

Competitive pay (â‚¹1200/hour).
Flexible hours.
Remote opportunity.


NOTE: Pay will vary by project and typically is up to Rs. 1200 per hour (if you work an average of 3 hours every day - that could be as high as Rs. 108K per month) once you clear our screening process.


Shape the future of AI with Soul AI!
